data.name: prn_awaiting_acceptance_explanation
data.value: [Welsh]The reprocessor issued the PRN to the producer or compliance scheme. The producer or compliance scheme has not yet accepted the PRN.

data.name: prn_accepted_explanation
data.value: [Welsh]The producer or compliance scheme accepted the PRN.

data.name: prn_rejected_explanation
data.value: [Welsh]The producer or compliance scheme rejected the PRN.

data.name: pern_awaiting_acceptance_explanation
data.value: [Welsh]The exporter issued the PERN to the producer or compliance scheme. The producer or compliance scheme has not yet accepted the PERN.

data.name: pern_accepted_explanation
data.value: [Welsh]The producer or compliance scheme accepted the PERN.

data.name: pern_rejected_explanation
data.value: [Welsh]The producer or compliance scheme rejected the PERN.
